name: Webpack
description: A static module bundler for modern JavaScript applications.

name: Gulp
description: A toolkit for automating painful or time-consuming tasks in your development workflow.

name: Grunt
description: A JavaScript task runner, used to automate repetitive tasks like minification, compilation, and unit testing.

name: Parcel
description: A zero configuration web application bundler.

name: Rollup
description: A module bundler for JavaScript which compiles small pieces of code into something larger and more complex.

name: Babel
description: A JavaScript compiler that lets you use next generation JavaScript, today.
